body_html:
Try this: In the directory into which you cloned TensorFlow, run ./configure, and select the python2 when asked.

Run bazel build //tensorflow/tools/api/tests/api_compatibility_test
Run bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/api/tests/api_compatibility_test --update_goldens True

Does that work for you?
body_text:
Try this: In the directory into which you cloned TensorFlow, run ./configure, and select the python2 when asked.
Run bazel build //tensorflow/tools/api/tests/api_compatibility_test
Run bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/api/tests/api_compatibility_test --update_goldens True
Does that work for you?
body:
Try this: In the directory into which you cloned TensorFlow, run ./configure, and select the python2 when asked.

Run `bazel build //tensorflow/tools/api/tests/api_compatibility_test`
Run `bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/api/tests/api_compatibility_test --update_goldens True`

Does that work for you?
